page.title: 13Public Transport
page.content: Public transport runs through the area six days a week (Sundays excepted). Starting at 9 am in Carddigan and running every two hours to Carmarthen. The last bus leaving Cardigan at 5.30 pm. The reverse service leaving Carmarthen for Cardigan and running every two hours commencing 9 am and finishing at 8pm. On Fridays two buses leave Newcastle Emlyn going to Crdigan via Ponthirwan oyadd Crss and Penllwynddu at 10.19am and 12.45 pm. With this scanty service runing through the area it is imperative for people to have their own transport inorder to get along with living. The armed forces use the air space over this vicinity also to practise lowflying manoevers this being most disconcerting to humans and animals alike.
